WorkItem.Description:
i have downloaded SDK Microsoft framework 4.0 & install it on my PC with win 7 OS 

Now Any oneher ewho can tell me the how to include window.h file and use window API
WorkItem.Summary: how to include window.h file in turbo c++3.0

Comments.Message:
windows.h is not the part Turbo C++. So, you can't use windows.h in Turbo C++.

Alternatively, you could look into any of several alternatives such as Dev-C++, Visual Studio Express, Cygwin, or Digital Mars. Edit: Or Code::Blocks, Ultimate++/TheIDE, NetBeans, or Eclipse CDT.
